analysis.description:
DadiMaxCapSale.closeSale (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#383-397) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(recipient,remaining) (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#396)

DadiMaxCapSale.distributeTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#411-423) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_address,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#420-421)

DadiMaxCapSale.distributeToAlternateAddress (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#431-445) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_tokenAddress,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#444)

DadiMaxCapSale.redistributeTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#455-470) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(recipient,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#468)

DadiMaxCapSale.ethRate should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x567b27ae0d0ea4fca292f447d819aa1b366375c4.sol#244-245)
